parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The cluster ID. This parameter is required if the ClusterType parameter is set to ask.

parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description: The type of the cluster. Valid values: ask and ecs.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group id of the Prometheus instance.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC). This parameter is required if the ClusterType parameter is set to ecs.
